reference: Black, Fischer. 1980. The tax consequences of long-run pension policy. Financial Analysts Journal 36; 25-31. Feldstein, Martin and Seligman, Stephanie. 1981. Pension funding, share prices, and national savings. Journal of Finance 36: 801-824.

Pesando, James. 1981. Employee valuation of pension claims and the impact of indexing initiatives. Mimeo, National Bureau of Economic Research.
Scholes, Myron. 1981. Investigation of the Tepper/Black funding and allocation theory. Mimeo, National Bureau of Economic Research.
Sharpe, William F. 1976. Corporate pension funding policy. Journal of Financial Economics 3; 183-193.
Ttepper, Irwin. 1981. Taxation and corporate pension policy. Journal of Finance 36: 1-14.
Tepper, Irwin, and Affleck, A.R.P. 1974. Pension plan liabilities and corporate financial strategies. Journal of Finance 29: 1549-1564.
